entry.title: Saturday: Rain or snow. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning then changing to rain near noon. Snow over northern sections early this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm over northern sections. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
